response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Analysis of Technology Trends for Product Development and Sales Improvement

1. Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
   - Potential for AI-powered personal assistants
   - Machine learning for predictive maintenance in industrial equipment
   - AI-driven data analytics for business intelligence tools

2. Internet of Things (IoT)
   - Smart home devices and systems
   - Industrial IoT for manufacturing optimization
   - Wearable technology for health and fitness

3. 5G Technology
   - High-speed mobile devices and accessories
   - Enhanced augmented and virtual reality experiences
   - Improved video streaming and gaming products

4. Cybersecurity
   - Advanced encryption tools for businesses and individuals
   - AI-powered threat detection systems
   - Privacy-focused software and hardware solutions

5. Edge Computing
   - Edge devices for faster data processing
   - Low-latency solutions for autonomous vehicles
   - Distributed cloud services for improved performance

6. Blockchain
   - Decentralized finance (DeFi) applications
   - Supply chain management solutions
   - Digital identity verification systems

7. Sustainable Technology
   - Energy-efficient products and solutions
   - Renewable energy technologies
   - Eco-friendly materials for manufacturing

8. Quantum Computing
   - Quantum-inspired optimization software
   - Quantum cryptography for secure communications
   - Quantum sensors for various industries

9. Extended Reality (XR)
   - AR/VR headsets for gaming and professional use
   - Mixed reality applications for education and training
   - XR collaboration tools for remote work

10. Robotics and Automation
    - Collaborative robots for manufacturing and logistics
    - Service robots for healthcare and hospitality
    - Autonomous drones for various applications

</OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Analysis of Technology Trends for Product Development and Sales Improvement

1. Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
   - Potential for AI-powered personal assistants

   - AI-driven data analytics for business intelligence tools
